posts.content:
Hi all ,
I have been asked to post on this forum ...

I build quality interiors from a vast range of real wood veneers to formica type laminates , from small one off cabinets to complete interiors.
I am based in the Midlands and have been building bespoke joinery for 25 years now , I love my job and have a lot of pride in my work .
Any questions please get in touch
Email r.b.d@hotmail.com
Mob 07714793030

These are a few prices for you to look over ( SELF FIT )
Rear facing bench seats 3/4 £600.. with small cabinet £875
Single buddy seats as photos £399 each
Curved kick boards £299 each
Overhead lockers £299 each

All the above prices are built from Birch ply oak veneered them sprayed in 3 coats of clear lacquer .
Please look at Facebook page Richard Booth Design for many other photos
